author: cms-tsg-storm
body:
- Switch saveTag=true in several filters (to allow inspecting them in the analyses)
- Migrate to a new ConfDB template
- Update a few L1 seeds for EXO paths
- Replace PFMHTIDLoose with PFMHTIDTight

It also includes #8808, which is needed for the CMSSW_7_4_1_HLT1 ConfDB template
title: HLT menu updates on top of what was in CMSSW_7_4_1 (for 74X)
